Mass Times

Mass is currently celebrated at St Mary\'s on
Saturdays at 8am,
Sundays at 9am and again at 5pm.

There is also a 7am Mass on weekday mornings
(Monday to Friday)

Click here to view the Mass Times Schedule for
the Cathedral of St Stephen in Brisbane City
and also St Patrick\'s Church, Fortitude Valley.
